info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.description:
Using default search preferences or the preferences already set by the PhoneListPreferences Service
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: SearchString

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Adds a new contact to the history/favorites.
post.description:
Returns the rank of the new history item. If the contact already existed in the history, it isn't added but the rank is updated.
NsApiSlow threshold: 2000 ms.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PhoneList.description: Search: Searching the phone list. Using default search preferences or the preferences already set by the PhoneListPreferences Service

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PhoneListItem.description:
Carrier object for PhoneListItem.
Services for the PhoneListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPhoneListAgent">PhoneList Agent</see>.

PersonFaxNumber.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

PersonPagerNumber.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

UniqueId.description: Property setting a unique id indicating if this is a person or contact

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PhoneList.description: SearchWithPreferences: Searching the phone list. Search is based on the supplied preferences.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PhoneListPrefer.description:
Search preferences for a phone list search
<para />
Carrier object for PhoneListPreferences.
Services for the PhoneListPreferences Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPhoneListAgent">PhoneList Agent</see>.

SearchCompany.description: True if you want to search for Companies by their name.

SearchFirstname.description: True if you want to search for Persons by their firstname.

SearchLastname.description: True if you want to search for Persons by their lastname.

SearchDepartment.description: True if you want to search for Departments where your colleagues work.

SearchModeCompany.description: The Company name search type, e.g. BeginsWith, Contains, Endswith, Matches

SearchModeDepartment.description: The Department search type, e.g. BeginsWith, Contains, Endswith, Matches

SearchModeFirstname.description: The firstname search type, e.g. BeginsWith, Contains, Endswith, Matches

SearchModeLastname.description: The lastname search type, e.g. BeginsWith, Contains, Endswith, Matches

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.PhoneList.description: GetDepartmentPhones: Returns an array of phone list items with the in-parameter as restriction. The in-parameter must be a valid department id (UserGroupId).
GetContactPhones: Returns an array of phone list items for all the persons belonging to a contact (company). The in-parameter must be a valid contact-id.
AddToFavorites: Adds a new contact to the history/favorites. Returns the rank of the new history item. If the contact already existed in the history, it isn't added but the rank is updated.
SetPreferences: Setting Phone List Preferences to the CRM 5 user preferences

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
